trans-unit.source: Variable Declaration in Visual Basic | Microsoft Docs
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 中的變數宣告 |Microsoft 文件

trans-unit.source: Variable Declaration in Visual Basic
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 中的變數宣告

trans-unit.source: You declare a variable to specify its name and characteristics.
trans-unit.target: 您宣告變數，以指定其名稱和特性。

trans-unit.source: The declaration statement for variables is the [Dim Statement](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/statements/dim-statement.md).
trans-unit.target: 變數的宣告陳述式是[Dim 陳述式](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/statements/dim-statement.md)。

trans-unit.source: Its location and contents determine the variable's characteristics.
trans-unit.target: 其位置及內容會決定變數的特性。

trans-unit.source: For variable naming rules and considerations, see [Declared Element Names](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/declared-elements/declared-element-names.md).
trans-unit.target: 變數的命名規則及考量，請參閱[宣告項目名稱](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/declared-elements/declared-element-names.md)。

trans-unit.source: Declaration Levels
trans-unit.target: 宣告層級

trans-unit.source: Local and Member Variables
trans-unit.target: 本機和成員變數

trans-unit.source: A *local variable* is one that is declared within a procedure.
trans-unit.target: A*區域變數*是其中一個程序內宣告。

trans-unit.source: A *member variable* is a member of a [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)] type; it is declared at module level, inside a class, structure, or module, but not within any procedure internal to that class, structure, or module.
trans-unit.target: A*成員變數*隸屬[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)]輸入; 它在模組層級，在類別、 結構或模組，但不是在任何程序內部的類別、 結構或模組內宣告。

trans-unit.source: Shared and Instance Variables
trans-unit.target: 共用與執行個體變數

trans-unit.source: In a class or structure, the category of a member variable depends on whether or not it is shared.
trans-unit.target: 在類別或結構中，成員變數的類別取決於共用。

trans-unit.source: If it is declared with the [Shared](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/shared.md) keyword, it is a *shared variable*, and it exists in a single copy shared among all instances of the class or structure.
trans-unit.target: 如果它以宣告[共用](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/shared.md)關鍵字，它是*共用的變數*，並且存在於類別或結構的所有執行個體之間共用的單一複本。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise it is an *instance variable*, and a separate copy of it is created for each instance of the class or structure.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它會*執行個體變數*，並為類別或結構的每個執行個體建立個別的複本。

trans-unit.source: A given copy of an instance variable is available only to the instance of the class or structure in which it was created.
trans-unit.target: 指定的複本的執行個體變數是僅適用於類別或結構建立所在的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: It is independent of a copy of the instance variable in any other instance of the class or structure.
trans-unit.target: 它是複本的變數的獨立的執行個體中類別或結構的任何其他執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Declaring Data Type
trans-unit.target: 宣告資料型別

trans-unit.source: The [As](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/statements/as-clause.md) clause in the declaration statement allows you to define the data type or object type of the variable you are declaring.
trans-unit.target: [為](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/statements/as-clause.md)子句中的宣告陳述式可讓您定義資料型別或物件類型所宣告的變數。

trans-unit.source: You can specify any of the following types for a variable:
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定任何下列類型的變數︰

trans-unit.source: An elementary data type, such as `Boolean`, `Long`, or `Decimal`
trans-unit.target: 基本的資料類型，例如`Boolean`， `Long`，或`Decimal`

trans-unit.source: A composite data type, such as an array or structure
trans-unit.target: 複合資料類型，例如陣列或結構

trans-unit.source: An object type, or class, defined either in your application or in another application
trans-unit.target: 物件類型或類別，定義您的應用程式或其他應用程式

trans-unit.source: A [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](../../../../csharp/getting-started/includes/dnprdnshort_md.md)] class, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>
trans-unit.target: A[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](../../../../csharp/getting-started/includes/dnprdnshort_md.md)]類別，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>

trans-unit.source: An interface type, such as <xref:System.IComparable> or <xref:System.IDisposable>
trans-unit.target: 介面類型，例如<xref:System.IComparable>或<xref:System.IDisposable></xref:System.IDisposable></xref:System.IComparable>

trans-unit.source: You can declare several variables in one statement without having to repeat the data type.
trans-unit.target: 您可以宣告一個陳述式中的數個變數而不用重複的資料型別。

trans-unit.source: In the following statements, the variables `i`, `j`, and `k` are declared as type `Integer`, `l` and `m` as `Long`, and `x` and `y` as `Single`:
trans-unit.target: 下列陳述式的變數`i`， `j`，和`k`宣告為類型`Integer`，`l`和`m`為`Long`，和`x`和`y`為`Single`:

trans-unit.source: For more information on data types, see [Data Types](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/data-types/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關資料類型的詳細資訊，請參閱[資料型別](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/data-types/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information on objects, see [Objects and Classes](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/objects-and-classes/index.md) and [Programming with Components](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d4d4fcb4-e0b8-46b3-b679-7ee0026eb9e3).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關物件的詳細資訊，請參閱[物件和類別](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/objects-and-classes/index.md)和[元件程式設計](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d4d4fcb4-e0b8-46b3-b679-7ee0026eb9e3)。

trans-unit.source: Local Type Inference
trans-unit.target: 區域類型推斷

trans-unit.source: *Type inference* is used to determine the data types of local variables declared without an `As` clause.
trans-unit.target: *型別推斷*用來判斷資料類型的未宣告的區域變數`As`子句。

trans-unit.source: The compiler infers the type of the variable from the type of the initialization expression.
trans-unit.target: 編譯器會推斷變數的初始化運算式的型別類型。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to declare variables without explicitly stating a type.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您宣告變數而不用明確陳述型別。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, both `num1` and `num2` are strongly typed as integers.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，同時`num1`和`num2`強型別為整數。

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[VbVbalrTypeInference#1](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/statements/codesnippet/VisualBasic/variable-declaration_1.vb)]
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[VbVbalrTypeInference #&1;](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/statements/codesnippet/VisualBasic/variable-declaration_1.vb)]

trans-unit.source: If you want to use local type inference, `Option Infer` must be set to `On`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要使用區域型別推斷`Option Infer`必須設為`On`。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Local Type Inference](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/variables/local-type-inference.md) and [Option Infer Statement](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/statements/option-infer-statement.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[本機的型別推斷](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/variables/local-type-inference.md)和[Option Infer 陳述式](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/statements/option-infer-statement.md)。

trans-unit.source: Characteristics of Declared Variables
trans-unit.target: 宣告變數的特性

trans-unit.source: The *lifetime* of a variable is the period of time during which it is available for use.
trans-unit.target: *存留期*的變數是一段時間期間它是可供使用。

trans-unit.source: In general, a variable exists as long as the element that declares it (such as a procedure or class) continues to exist.
trans-unit.target: 一般情況下，變數存在，只要宣告 （例如程序或類別） 的項目會繼續存在。

trans-unit.source: If the variable does not need to continue existing beyond the lifetime of its containing element, you do not need to do anything special in the declaration.
trans-unit.target: 如果變數不需要其包含項目的存留期過後繼續存在，您不需要任何特別的宣告中。

trans-unit.source: If the variable needs to continue to exist longer than its containing element, you can include the `Static` or `Shared` keyword in its `Dim` statement.
trans-unit.target: 如果變數需要持續時間超過其包含項目存在，您可以包含`Static`或`Shared`關鍵字其`Dim`陳述式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Lifetime in Visual Basic](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/declared-elements/lifetime.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[在 Visual Basic 中的存留期](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/declared-elements/lifetime.md)。

trans-unit.source: The *scope* of a variable is the set of all code that can refer to it without qualifying its name.
trans-unit.target: *範圍*變數是完全不需限定其名稱參考的所有程式碼。

trans-unit.source: A variable's scope is determined by where it is declared.
trans-unit.target: 變數的範圍取決於宣告的位置。

trans-unit.source: Code located in a given region can use the variables defined in that region without having to qualify their names.
trans-unit.target: 位於指定區域中的程式碼可以使用定義於該區域中，而不需要完整名稱的變數。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Scope in Visual Basic](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/declared-elements/scope.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Visual Basic 中的範圍](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/declared-elements/scope.md)。

trans-unit.source: A variable's *access level* is the extent of code that has permission to access it.
trans-unit.target: 變數的*存取層級*是具有存取權限的程式碼的範圍。

trans-unit.source: This is determined by the access modifier (such as [Public](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/public.md) or [Private](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/private.md)) that you use in the `Dim` statement.
trans-unit.target: 這取決於存取修飾詞 (例如[公用](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/public.md)或[私用](../../../../visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/private.md)) 中使用`Dim`陳述式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Access Levels in Visual Basic](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/declared-elements/access-levels.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[在 Visual Basic 中的存取層級](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/declared-elements/access-levels.md)。
